Auth.tosContent: Welcome to AutoStocker BETA. By accepting these terms you agree to maintain respectful behavior in the community. Posting offensive content, spam, or illegal material in the comments is strictly prohibited. We reserve the right to suspend or delete accounts that violate these rules. The service is currently provided 'as is' in the testing phase, without warranties.
Auth.privacyContent: Your privacy is important to us. We collect your email address and nickname solely to create your account and allow you to interact with the blog (e.g., leaving likes and comments). Your passwords are securely encrypted by the system. We do not sell your data to third parties and will not spam you. You can request the deletion of your account at any time.
